mesquite.lib

Class MiniSliderWithText

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • mesquite.lib.MiniSliderWithText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.TextListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, Explainable, ImageOwner, Listable, MiniControl

    public class MiniSliderWithText
extends java.awt.Panel
implements MiniControl, Explainable, ImageOwner, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.TextListener
    A miniature slider used to set the value of a MesquiteNumber. It provides an incrementing and decrementing arrow, and a text field to show current value.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
